name: accursed
description: blessed contributions, extensions, typings, documentation and apps

scripts.prettier: npx ts-refactor organizeImports "src/**/*.ts*" "spec/**/*.ts*" --dontAsk && npx prettier  --write --arrow-parens avoid --parser typescript --use-tabs false --no-semi true --single-quote true --tab-width 2 --trailing-comma none --end-of-line lf --prose-wrap preserve --print-width 120  --jsx-bracket-same-line true "src/**/*.ts*" "spec/**/*.ts*"
scripts.copy: cp src/declarations/*.d.ts dist/src/declarations && rm -rf dist/src/index.d.ts && cp dist/src/index_publish.d.ts dist/src/index.d.ts
scripts.docs: rm -rf docs && npm run docs-readme-toc && npm run docs-readme-toc && npm run docs-blessed-md && npm run docs-blessed && npm run docs-accursed-md && npm run docs-accursed
scripts.docs-blessed-md: D=docs/api/blessed-md && rm -rf $D; mkdir -p $D ; npx typedoc --includeDeclarations  --name blessed --readme none --toc --hideGenerator --ignoreCompilerErrors 'src/declarations/blessed.d.ts' --theme markdown --out $D --excludeExternals --mdDocusaurus
scripts.docs-blessed: D=docs/api/blessed &&  rm -rf $D; mkdir -p $D ; npx typedoc --includeDeclarations  --name blessed --readme none --toc --hideGenerator --ignoreCompilerErrors 'src/declarations/blessed.d.ts' --out $D --excludeExternals
scripts.docs-accursed-md: D=docs/api/accursed-md && rm -rf $D; mkdir $D ; npx typedoc --includeDeclarations  --name accursed --toc --hideGenerator --ignoreCompilerErrors 'src/index_publish.ts' --theme markdown --out $D --excludeExternals
scripts.docs-accursed: D=docs/api/accursed && rm -rf $D; mkdir -p $D ; npm run build && npx typedoc --options typedoc.ts  --ignoreCompilerErrors 'src/declarations/blessed.d.ts' --out $D --excludeExternals
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run prettier && npm run build && npm test

author: Sebastian Gurin
